channel.title: mutt on Aishwarya Pant's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in mutt on Aishwarya Pant's Blog

item.title: offlineimap + mutt = how to deal with LKML
item.description: LKML is a very high volume mailing list. I accumulate around 500 emails during the time I spend sleeping. It’s a kitchen sink for every kernel patch and discussion that is going on, which is a good thing and a bad thing. Because I care about only a few of them. Most users subscribe to and read only subsystem specific mailing lists. The trick is to run scripts on top of them to find the emails of interest.
